alert.note: Alert for Union (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued January 27 at 6:41PM MST until January 28 at 8:00AM MST by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM CST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...Portions of northwest and west central Iowa, southwest Minnesota, northeast Nebraska, and southeast South Dakota. * WHEN...Until 9 AM CST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Low visibility could make driving conditions hazardous. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Temperatures falling below freezing tonight may lead to isolated slick spots, especially on untreated or elevated surfaces.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.
